scripts.run:analyze-npm-action: yarn clean && concurrently "yarn pack-remote && tsx ./src/runners/analyze-package.ts --remote --out trunk-results.json" "yarn pack-local && tsx ./src/runners/analyze-package.ts --out branch-results.json"
scripts.run:analyze-local-action: yarn clean && yarn pack-local && tsx ./src/runners/analyze-package.ts --out trunk-results.json
scripts.run:analyze-branch-action: yarn clean && yarn pack-local && tsx ./src/runners/analyze-package.ts --out branch-results.json
